Subject: Renewable Energy Department
Description: The National Renewable Energy Policy was administered by the Renewable Energy Department.

Subject: German Development Cooperation
Description: The Renewable Energy Policy was supported by the German Development Cooperation.

Subject: Energy Policy Department
Description: The Energy Policy Department contributed to the development of the National Renewable Energy Policy.

Subject: Ministry of Energy and Water
Description: The Ministry of Energy and Water provided funding for the National Renewable Energy Policy.

Subject: Inter-Ministerial Commission for Energy Secretariat Team
Description: The Inter-Ministerial Commission for Energy Secretariat Team collaborates with the German Development Cooperation.

Subject: National Renewable Energy Policy
Object: Inter-Ministerial Commission for Energy Secretariat Team
Description: The National Renewable Energy Policy is supported by the Inter-Ministerial Commission for Energy Secretariat Team.

Subject: Renewable Energy Coordination Committee
Description: The Renewable Energy Coordination Committee partners with the National Renewable Energy Policy.

Subject: Renewable Energy Coordination Committee
Object: Inter-Ministerial Commission for Energy Secretariat Team
Description: The Renewable Energy Coordination Committee partners with the Inter-Ministerial Commission for Energy Secretariat Team.

Subject: NEPA
Description: National Environmental Protection Agency (NEPA) partners with United States Assistance International Development (USAID).

Subject: Afghanistan
Description: The Afghanistan Renewable Energy Policy (AREP) aims to provide a thrust and direction to the REN sector.

Subject: Afghanistan
Description: The Renewable Energy Coordination Committee (RECC) will be set up within the MEW.

Subject: MEW
Description: MEW will collaborate with RECC for the implementation of AREP.

Subject: Ministry Of Energy and Water
Description: The Ministry Of Energy and Water partners with the Renewable Energy Department.

Subject: Afghanistan
Description: The Ministry of Energy and Water administers the development of the energy sector in Afghanistan.

Subject: Afghanistan
Description: The Vision of AREP is enshrined in the Vision of Afghanistan- A society of hope and prosperity based on strong, private sector led economy, social equity and environmental sustainability – and its overall objective is to optimally deploy and utilize renewable energy resources in all possible manner to realize this Vision.

Subject: Afghanistan
Description: MRRD will support the implementation of rural REN projects of upto one (1MW) MW capacity for providing energy services to various rural development related applications including domestic, productive, health, education, water pumping etc. and will coordinate with other Ministries such as MAIL and MPH.

Subject: Afghanistan
Description: For O&M of rural REN projects below the capacity of 100 kW, utilities will coordinate with MRRD.

Subject: Afghanistan
Description: A strong local industry for manufacture, assembly, installation and servicing would be required to sustain the REN sector in Afghanistan in future.

Subject: MEW
Description: On one hand, a cadre of entrepreneurs would be created through technical and vocational training given by Vocational Training Centre (VTC) of MEW to support the REN sector.
